title: Royal Suite
description: Indulge in an exclusive retreat featuring an in-room private pool, elegant dining space, and premium interiors designed for unmatched comfort. Perfect for celebrations, intimate gatherings, and VIP stays.
listDescription: Indulge in an exclusive retreat featuring an in-room private pool, elegant dining space, and premium interiors.
detailDescription:
The Royal Suite is designed for guests who desire an extraordinary stay, blending elegance, privacy, and complete indulgence. From warm lighting to spacious interiors and refined décor, every corner elevates the sense of luxury. The private in-room swimming pool adds an exclusive touch, making the suite perfect for romantic getaways, VIP guests, small celebrations, or high-profile corporate stays.

A separate dining area, balcony, and premium furnishings create a serene environment to relax or entertain. Whether you're celebrating an occasion or enjoying a premium work-and-relax retreat, the Royal Suite delivers an unforgettable experience with the finest comfort and privacy.

title: Deluxe Suite
description: Experience refined elegance with a private Jacuzzi, modern décor, and a calm, relaxing ambience. Ideal for couples, executives, and guests seeking comfort with a touch of luxury.
listDescription: Experience refined elegance with a private Jacuzzi, modern décor, and a calm, relaxing ambience.
detailDescription:
The Deluxe Suite offers a warm and stylish setting, making it ideal for both leisure travellers and corporate professionals who prefer comfort with elegance. The soothing interiors and spacious layout create a peaceful atmosphere to unwind after a long day. The private in-room Jacuzzi adds a luxurious spa-like touch, perfect for rejuvenation.

Whether you're a couple celebrating a special moment or an executive on a business trip, the Deluxe Suite offers privacy, comfort, and premium hospitality. Its thoughtfully crafted ambience ensures a refreshing experience for short stays, weekend breaks, and corporate visits.

title: Executive Suite
description: Designed for business and leisure, this suite offers a spacious layout, separate dining area, and sophisticated interiors. A perfect blend of productivity and relaxation for corporate travellers.
listDescription: Designed for business and leisure, this suite offers a spacious layout, separate dining area, and sophisticated interiors.
detailDescription:
The Executive Suite is designed specifically for corporate travellers, business professionals, and long-stay guests, offering the perfect balance of comfort and productivity. Its smart layout, calming décor, and dedicated dining and work-friendly space create an environment ideal for meetings, work calls, or focused tasks. The private balcony and soft ambient lighting make it equally perfect for unwinding after a busy day.

Whether you're visiting Raipur for work, attending conferences, or requiring extended-stay accommodation, the Executive Suite ensures a smooth, efficient, and premium experience. It delivers all the essentials of corporate comfort with a touch of luxury.

title: Duo Suite
description: A spacious dual-suite experience created for families and groups. Enjoy two connected suites with ample space, privacy, and comfort—ideal for vacations, wedding guests, and long stays.
listDescription: A spacious dual-suite experience created for families and groups.
detailDescription:
The Duo Suite is the ideal choice for families, groups, wedding guests, and even corporate teams who prefer staying together with the comfort of individual privacy. Featuring two connected luxury suites, the space is designed for both bonding and personal relaxation. With multiple dining areas and balconies, the suite provides ample room for shared moments and peaceful downtime.

Premium interiors, spacious rooms, and thoughtful amenities make the Duo Suite perfect for extended vacations, family gatherings, group tours, and team stays during corporate events. It brings the comfort of home with the luxury of a premium stay experience.
